abstract.p: Apparatus and methods are described for correlating business relationships and issuing earnings estimates. According to the present invention, an earnings estimate can be generated for a company as it compares to a consensus estimate, or other rating aggregate, along with an indication of an investment banking relationship or other business relationship that the entity providing the estimate has had with the company. In addition to a consensus estimate that may be based upon current and previous analyst earnings estimates, operating actuals, expected reporting dates, footnotes and company-issued guidelines, indications of investment banking relationships and a consensus estimate is provided that excludes input from banks conducting business with the company. The present invention can also include suggested actions that can be taken based upon data relating to an investment banking relationship, an earnings estimate and/or a consensus earnings estimate that excludes input from banks with substantial business relationships with the company.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: INDEPENDENT RESEARCH CONSENSUS EARNINGS ESTIMATES AND METHODS OF DETERMINING SUCH

According to the present invention, an earnings estimate can be generated for a company as it compares to a consensus estimate, or other rating aggregate, along with an indication of an investment banking relationship or other business relationship that the entity providing the estimate has had with the company. In addition to a consensus estimate that may be based upon current and previous analyst earnings estimates, operating actuals, expected reporting dates, footnotes and company-issued guidelines, indications of investment banking relationships and a consensus estimate is provided that excludes input from banks conducting business with the company.

The present invention can also include suggested actions that can be taken based upon data relating to an investment banking relationship, an earnings estimate and/or a consensus earnings estimate that excludes input from banks with substantial business relationships with the company.

abstract.p: Apparatus and methods are described for correlating business relationships and issuing earnings estimates. According to the present invention, an earnings estimate can be generated for a company as it compares to a consensus estimate, or other rating aggregate, along with an indication of an investment banking relationship or other business relationship that the entity providing the estimate has had with the company. In addition to a consensus estimate that may be based upon current and previous analyst earnings estimates, operating actuals, expected reporting dates, footnotes and company-issued guidelines, indications of investment banking relationships and a consensus estimate is provided that excludes input from banks conducting business with the company.

The present invention can also include suggested actions that can be taken based upon data relating to an investment banking relationship, an earnings estimate and/or a consensus earnings estimate that excludes input from banks with substantial business relationships with the company.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: INDEPENDENT RESEARCH CONSENSUS EARNINGS ESTIMATES AND METHODS OF DETERMINING SUCH
ESTIMATIONS CONSENSUELLES DE GAINS DE RECHERCHES INDEPENDANTES ET PROCEDES DE DETERMINATION DE CES ESTIMATIONS

abstract.p: Apparatus and methods are described for correlating business relationships and issuing earnings estimates. According to the present invention, an earnings estimate can be generated for a company as it compares to a consensus estimate, or other rating aggregate, along with an indication of an investment banking relationship or other business relationship that the entity providing the estimate has had with the company. In addition to a consensus estimate that may be based upon current and previous analyst earnings estimates, operating actuals, expected reporting dates, footnotes and company-issued guidelines, indications of investment banking relationships and a consensus estimate is provided that excludes input from banks conducting business with the company.

The present invention can also include suggested actions that can be taken based upon data relating to an investment banking relationship, an earnings estimate and/or a consensus earnings estimate that excludes input from banks with substantial business relationships with the company.

L'invention concerne un appareil et des procédés permettant de corréler des relations commerciales et d'émettre des estimations de gains. On peut générer une estimation de gains d'une entreprise en comparant une estimation consensuelle, ou autre agrégat d'évaluation, avec une indication d'une relation bancaire d'investissement, ou autre relation d'affaires, que l'entité fournissant l'estimation avait avec l'entreprise. Outre une estimation consensuelle susceptible d'être fondée sur des estimations de gains d'analystes courantes et passées, les réalisations d'exploitation, les dates de clôture escomptées, les directives et les lignes directrices émises par l'entreprise, l'invention concerne des indications de relations bancaires d'investissement et une estimation consensuelle excluant un apport des banques en relations d'affaires avec l'entreprise.

L'invention concerne également des mesures suggérées pouvant être prises en fonction des données relatives à une relation bancaire d'investissement, une estimation de gains et/ou une estimation consensuelle de gains excluant un apport des banques en relations d'affaires sensibles avec l'entreprise.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: INDEPENDENT RESEARCH CONSENSUS EARNINGS ESTIMATES AND METHODS OF DETERMINING SUCH
ESTIMATIONS CONSENSUELLES DE GAINS DE RECHERCHES INDEPENDANTES ET PROCEDES DE DETERMINATION DE CES ESTIMATIONS

abstract.p: Apparatus and methods are described for correlating business relationships and issuing earnings estimates. According to the present invention, an earnings estimate (101) can be generated for a company as it compares to a consensus estimate (104), or other rating aggregate, along with an indication of an investment banking relationship or other business relationship that the entity providing the estimate has had with the company. The present invention can also include suggested actions (107) that can be taken based upon data relating to an investment banking relationship, an earnings estimate and/or a consunsus earnings estimate that excludes input from banks with substantial business relationships (105) with the company.

L'invention concerne un appareil et des procédés permettant de corréler des relations commerciales et d'émettre des estimations de gains. On peut générer une estimation de gains d'une entreprise en comparant une estimation consensuelle, ou autre agrégat d'évaluation, avec une indication d'une relation bancaire d'investissement, ou autre relation d'affaires, que l'entité fournissant l'estimation avait avec l'entreprise. Outre une estimation consensuelle susceptible d'être fondée sur des estimations de gains d'analystes courantes et passées, les réalisations d'exploitation, les dates de clôture escomptées, les directives et les lignes directrices émises par l'entreprise, l'invention concerne des indications de relations bancaires d'investissement et une estimation consensuelle excluant un apport des banques en relations d'affaires avec l'entreprise.

L'invention concerne également des mesures suggérées pouvant être prises en fonction des données relatives à une relation bancaire d'investissement, une estimation de gains et/ou une estimation consensuelle de gains excluant un apport des banques en relations d'affaires sensibles avec l'entreprise.
